ArchiveActivity.name: ArchiveActivity
ArchiveActivity.description: Represents metadata retrieved for a single Archive process initiated by an action. Retrieved metadata can include status tracking, start and end times, record counts, and monitoring and auditing outcomes.

ArchivePolicyId.description: ID of the associated policy that triggered the process. Links each execution back to its configuration.

AttemptedRootRecordsCount.description: The number of root records that the action tried to process. Excludes records that were filtered out before processing began.

EndTime.description: The date and time that the process executed successfully, or was terminated due to error.

FailedCount.description: The number of records that failed to process due to errors such as validation failures, missing references, or system exceptions.

FailureReason.description: Description of why process failed or only partially completed. Can include system error messages or policy-level failures.

Name.description: The autogenerated name of the action instance.

ProgressPercentage.description: The percentage of records that were successfully processed.

RecordsSizeInMb.description: Estimated total size, in megabytes (MB), of the records processed during an action, including metadata and payload.

SkippedRootRecordsCount.description: The number of root records skipped due to validation errors, exclusion filters, or data protection thresholds.

StartTime.description: The date and time that the action started.

SucceededCount.description: The number of records processed successfully.

TotalRecordCount.description: The total number of records initially selected for processing, including successful, failed, and skipped records.

Type.description: Specifies the type of archive process to be executed. This static enum categorizes the purpose or mode of the run.Valid values are: Analyzer Archive Archive-fail-to-delete Estimate Export Export-and-download Export-to-external-bucket Import-data-archive Import-data-load Index-request None Purge Purge-by-retention Purge-estimation RTBF-SDK Unarchive Unarchive-retry Unarchive-sdk
